mapper.update:
UPDATE cms_page_tab_company
page_tab_id = #{pageTabId},
status = #{status},
show_platform_logo = #{showPlatformLogo},
show_client_logo = #{showClientLogo},
client_type = #{clientType},
platform_id = #{platformId},
company_id = #{companyId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
